# call F with argument path param

muxt generate --receiver-type=T

muxt check
-- in.go --
package main

type T struct{}

func (T) F(param string) any {return nil}
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var templatesDir embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(templatesDir, "template.gohtml")
-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.20
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET /{param} F(param)"}}{{end}}
